General.Name: Fort St James Nickel Corp
General.Description: Fort St. James Nickel Corp. acquires, evaluates, and explores mineral properties in North America. It explores for nickel deposits. The company holds a 100% interest in the Kilometer 26 property consisting of 5,778 hectares in the Omineca Mining Division, British Columbia; option agreement to acquire the Porcupine property located in the province of New Brunswick; and an agreement to acquire 100% interests in the Nepisiguit Property located in New Brunswick. Fort St. James Nickel Corp. was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 888 Dunsmuir Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3K4
